div.p: Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene xijo die Julij anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes blcrome per confessione lingue propre amerciatur et se
posuit in voluntate balliuorum pro perturbio et disperacione thome leslie
balliuj Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day Comperit Johne of mar' and James Colisone forspekar for
thar' nichtbouris tennentis of the wattiris of mydchingile pott and ferdis and complen
yet one michel bevmonde seruande tile Alexander menyeis aldirman Johne andirsone
seruand' tile sere Jhone ruthirfurde knicht Johne law seruitour to Johne Colisone Johne
grent seruande to Jhone Cullane gilbert Wellis seruitour to Androw Cullane Ane feit' seruitour
to Thomas leslie and vthir thar complicis for the strubuling of thame and for the fischingis
In the Stellis and placis vteuthe the boundis of the Raik Ande the saide knycht
forspekar for the Remanent of the said personis denyit ale strubulance and wranguis'
occupeing of ony fischingis et cetera Offering thame batht the partiis tile vndirlie ane
decisioun' of ane assis' vnsuspect Ande becaus' thai coude nocht ane assis' vnsuspect
be comprehendit the balye with consent of batht the saide partiis continevit the saide matir
quhile this day viij dais but preiudice tile ony partj quhile the ald' bukis be secht
for the declaracioun' of the verite Ande that day It to be decidit quethir the saide
personis awe to fische in the forsaid' placis quhile lammes or nocht Ande in the
meyn' the saide personis grantit to decist fra al fischingis In the saide placis to
the said' day

The saide day the balye continevit the borghis and Recovntouris betuix thome hay
and William Smytht and thar' witnesingis oppining quhile monunday that
next Cumis for waknes of the Court but preiudice tile ony partj in sic
lik force and effect as it standis now

The saide day Jonhne meldrum oblist him be the fatht of his bodie to pay
to Jhone Retre tua barrellis of Salmonde fule rede and Suet sufficient
merchande gude of the richtuis' bynde of aburdene at lammes nixt hereftir or within
viij dais thareftir for Redy money pait to him

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xixo die mensis Julij
anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis for materis concerning the tone continevit
the actioun' betuix thomas hay and William smitht ande megy hay his
spous' quhile this day viij dais but preiudice tile ony partj

Eodem die Willelmus skinner conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore patricij leslie prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis Anthone Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et cetera et pro emendam
soluet d' li' cere ad lumen sancti Sanguinis et cetera

Eodem die Andreas skinner conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore patricij leslie prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio Johannis Anthone Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et cetera Ac soluet
pro emenda vnam li' cere ad lumen sancti Sanguinis

head.add: penes conuersiam motam quod piscariam de Raik per aquarum superiorem tenentes

div.p:
The saide day Comperit sere Johne ruthirfurde forspekar for his nichtbouris
tenentis of the Raik and oppinly deneit ale wrang on the fischinge
in ony placis vteuthe the boundis of the fischingis of the wattir of the
Raik Offering thame redy tile vndirlie the decisione of ane assis'
vnsuspect Ande the balye for the tyme Coude nocht comprehende ane
assis' vnsuspect within the burghe' to decide the said debatis herfor the said'
knicht of him and his nichtbouris avouit the fischingis in the placis vsit
be thar mene and seruitouris with the perell of law

The saide day Comperit Johne of mar' forspekar for his nichbouris tennentis
of the vuerwatteris bevne the Raik ande Cpmplenyet one the seruandis to the
mastiris of the Raik for the wranguis' occupacion' in the stellis and vthir placis
by the boundis of the Raik and for strubuling of thame eftir the tenor of the
actis maid' tharapone obefor Requiring the balye to put the saide matir to
the decisione of ane assis' vnsuspect Ande becaus' the balye coud' nocht
Comprehende ane assis' vnsuspect to the decisioun' of the said' matir the
said' Johne forspekar for his nichtbouris in thar namys solemptlie protestit for
Remede of law tyme and place quhar it efferis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die Julij
anno quo supra

Eodem die Jacobus Srathachin nomine vxoris sue per confessionem lingue sue
amerciatur pro fractura assise vendens seruiciam xij d' et cetera et emendabit
ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Katherina vrchalde amerciatur per confessionem lingue propre vendens
seruiciam xij d' et cetera et emendabit ut Jura volunt

The saide day the ballieis ordanit Androw nachtj to ger' mak pament
to Johne Arthour' of xxvj s' and viij d' quhilkis Elizabetht Iruyne
grantit hir' borghe' for befor him

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvjo
die Julij anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne Kintor tuk him to preiwe that Androw hatmakar was bannist out
of tua burrowistonis' and the aldirman and ballieis assignit this day xl dais
lauchfule next hereftir to the saide Johne to preiwe his saide allegeance becaus'
his preiwe was beyonde fortht

The saide day Alexander Dondaldsone was conuict be ane suorne assis' Dauy
blinsel forspekar for strubulance of marione Coupar for the quhilk he was
in ane Amerciament of the court and to amende as law and forber' in tyme to cum
and scho quyt of ale strubulance of the saide Alexander

The saide day thomas hay one that ane part and William smitht one that vthir part
oblist thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stande and abide at the deliuerance
and ordinance of sere Johne ruthirfurde William futhes Jhone of Cullane and patry
leslie chosin betuix thame Anent the debatis of al gudis of airschip betuix tham

The saide day Androw hatmakar was conuict be ane Suorne assis' for
making of vnsufficient Stuff et cetera be ane Suorne assis' Dauy blinsel forspekar
to Amende as law wil and forber' in tyme to cum

The saide day Sandy brabner was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Dauy blinsel
forspekar for strubulance of the court et cetera

The said' day Sandy brabner was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Dauy blinsel
forspekar for Cutting and Riving of tua hattis of Androw hatmakaris et cetera
and tile amende as law wile and forber' in tyme to cum

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem Curie quod Willelmus michesone est legittimus
et propinquior heres quondam Johannis michesone patris suj

Eodem die Dauid litster' filius Johannis litstar conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam
ex ore Dauid menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Dauid grig Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Dauid grig conuictus fuit per dictam assisam ex ore Dauid menyeis prelocutoris
eiusdem pro perturbio leuj prefati Dauid litster Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes Cullane deuenit plegius per manum suam ad Intrandum dictum
Dauid litstar Coram preposito et balliuis quemcumque premunitus fuerit pro emendam eidem
Dauid faciendum pro perturbio sibj Illato Insuper deliberatum fuit per dictam
assisam quod si dictus Dauid litster' perturbare contigerit aliquem in postrum et
Inde conuictus fuerit Soluet fabrice ecclesie parrochiali dicti burgi xl s' sine Remissionem

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimonono die
mensis Julij anno quo supra

div.head: Nomina Inquisicionis thome chamer
div.p:
Johannes leslie de warderis Dauid menyeis Johannes cullane gilbertus menyeis Jacobus
Colisone Andreas murray thomas Waus matheus branche Dauid mar' patricius
Rede Dauid Kintor Andreas Steuinsone Willelmus vmfray Johannes arthour et Johannes
falconer burgensis dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Willelmus chamer patruus
thome chamer latoris presencium obiit vltra vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem
et fidem domini nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in Cono vici castrj
ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Willelmi moir' ex orientali ex vna et terram
quondam Andree branche ex occidentali partibus ab altera et Communionem viam regiam versus
boream extenden' in longitudine ad torrentem sancte trinitatis versus austrum Et quod dictus
thomas est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam Willelmi patruj suj de dicta
terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum
quinque s' et valuit xl d' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de suppremo
domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus domini nostre
Regis per decessum quondam dictum Willelmum patrui sui per Spacium vnius annj et dimidij
in dese margarete Kyntor Relicte quondam dict Willelmi patricij suj racione
coniuncte Infeodaciones

The said' day Comperit Johne leslie of Warderis and requirit the balyeis
to ger' cal thomas fyf to Comper tile ansuer' to the borghe' fundin on'
him be ormund' leslie his tennent for the wranguis' done Castyn' of
ane parte of ane dyk of his lande Ande the ballieis chargit William
scrimgeour officiar to preiwe his warning that he warnit and chargit the
said' thomas to Comper the saide' day tile ansuer' to the saide borghe
according to Justice Ande in continent the saide William thomas scot Johne
orde and Duncan ros' deponit the gret aithez that the saide William Wormet
and chargit the saide thomas fyf be his wande to Comper the saide day
and to fynd' him Souerte for his Compering to the ansuering to saide borghe' Ande
the said' thomas wald' mak him nayn' Ansuer' and passit his way
and fand' him nay Souerte for his And' thareftir the said' William
lauchfullie Callit the saide thomas tile comper to answuer' to the said'
borghe' quhilkis thomas Comperit nocht

The saide day patry leslie lauchfullie Callit tile entir Johne balcromy
to ansuer to gawane of murray for the wranguis' haldin fra him of
xl iiij s' Comperit nocht tharfor the balyeis chargit Androw nachtj sergeand'
to pas' and warne the saide patry to comper one friday that next
Cumis the secunde day of August that nixt cumis to Ansuer'
to the said' gawane et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die
mensis Augusti anno Domini millesimo quingentesimo quarto

The saide day Comperit Robert Dunhame Inglismane procurator to dame Katherine
fynkile' ande thomas Cramar' Inglisman befor the aldirman and balyeis sittande
in Jugement ande producit ane decret of the lordis of our' Soueranez lordis
Consale Anent certan Salmonde fische aving be thomas tode sone and ayr
tile vmquhile sere thomas tode and Archebalde frostar' of Corstrophin et cetera to
the saidez dame Katherine and thomas Cramar' et cetera Ande thareftir opinly schewe
and exponit that he his Schip marinaris and seruitouris hede Remanit within the port
of Abirdene xxj dais bigane Redy to the resauing of fiwe lastis j barrel and the
full of thre gallonis of Salmonde fische aucht to the saide persounis et cetera eftir'
the tenor of the saide decret And Coude nocht comprehende the saidez thomas
nor Archebald' nor nayn vthiris in thar' namez to mak pament of the saide
fische tharfor he Solemptlie protestit for his Costis Skathtis dampnis ande
expensis maide and to be maid' tharthrow Ande for Remede of law tyme and
place quhar' it efferis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis
augustj

The saide day Johne grig in Kingorne grantit him avande to Robert Kintor
tua half mulde stanis' of calme for chargeoris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem quinto die
mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day margaret Kintor offerit hir' redy tile deliuer to mathow
branche his airschip that he wantis he gevand' to hir' ane Sufficient
acquitance

The saide day it was deliuerit and fundin be ane Suorne assis' Alexander
gray forspekar that mavnys Skippar awe to resaue ane tuapartis
of ane Sek of woll of Johannez of Retreis in his schipe Ande
protestit for his Costis and Skathtis

Eodem die Willelmus gordone piscator conuictus fuit per assisam ex ore henrici
rede prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Willelmum harpar Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt et Idem Willelmus harpar quitus de perturbio dicti Willelmi gordone

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
Sexrto die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day James Colisone exponit that it was cumin to his
knaulage that thomas chapman hede gert gif Sesin of certane
lande in preiudice of Robert chapmane his Sone and appering ayr
his Cosing tharfor he Solemptlie protestit quhat euere was done
anent the gevin of the saide stat and possessione sulde nocht turne
to the saide child' to skatht nor' preiudice in tyme to cum

The saide day Johne tewage francheman mastir of ane Schip callit
mary of Rosmadowe grantit him pait of ale thingis aving to him be
Dauy Steuarte

Eodem die matheus branche conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis
Cullane prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Alexandri malisone Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt et Idem Alexander quitus de perturbio dicti Alexandri mathei

The saide day Alexander menyeis f aldirman forspekar for certane personis
opinlie declarit that James Colisone was quyt of ale strubulance
of Dauy ruthirfurde and of his wyf

head.add: plegios legales inter matheum branche et Alexandrum malisone

div.p:
Eodem die gilbertus menyeis deuenit plegius legalis quod Alexander malisone
erit Indempnis pro matheo branche aliis quam per viam Juris Et Alexander Rede
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus matheus erit Indempnis pro prefato Alexandro
aliter quam per viam Juris Ac pars frangens huiusmodi plegium Soluet quinque li'
fabrice ecclesie Sancti nicholaij

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Nono
die Augusti anno supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis
to Johne Kintor tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be the larde of
warderis Anent Compt' and pament for his keile et cetera and deliuerit the saide borghe'
to the saide Johne in writ

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die mensis
Augustj Anno quosupra et cetera

The said day the bailyes chargit Dauid mar to pay ane berrel of ter to
Jhonne Arthour quhilk he grantit in Incontinent

The said day Jhonne grig lauchfully warnit callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Androw futhes for the wran
guis' haldin fra him of vij li' tharfor the bailyes chargit Androw nachtj
to warne the saide Jhonne agane friday that nixt cumis to ansuer to
the said borghe

The said day the bailyes chargit Androw nachtj to reman' in the tolbuth
quhill he maid pament to Jhonne Arthour of xxvj s' viij d' for
elspet Iruyn' eftir the tenour of the actis obefor And William scrimgeor chargit
the said Androw be his wande to reman' in the tolbuth' for the pament of the said' Some
at command of the bailyes

Decimo sexto die mensis Augusti anno domini Millesimo quingentesimo quarto Johannes
grig fecit constituit creauit et nominauit patricium rede suum legittimum procuratorem
actorem et factorem dans et concedens eidem suam liberam et integram potestatem
pro se et nomine suo ad respondendum plegio super eum porrectum per Andream futhes
pro iniuste detencione ab eo summe septem li' et in omnibus aliis suis causis
et querellis Agendum defendendum prosequendum et ceteris calumpniandum Ceteraqe omnia
et singula faciendum promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij
Cum ceteris clausulis necesseriis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xix die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The saide day thomas Watsone grantit him borghe' to Dauy steuarte
for ane barrele of Salmonde for thome Dougles quhilk the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

The saide day Robert gothtray grantit him aving to Sandy moreson'
xxviij s' for ane hors' for the quhilkis he offerit him penny worthtis

The saide day Comperit patry rede with mady gilespy douchtir tile vmquhile
Johne gilespy and allegit scho was nerrast and lauchfule ayr to the lande
that patry Rede Inhabitis ande that he hede sende for our' Souerane lordis brevis
In hir' nayme beseking the aldirman and balyeis that thar' handis be closit
vnto the tyme the saide brevis be presentande gif thai did' ony
thing in the Contrar' that it turne her' tile nay preiudice

The saide day mastir Androw patirsone forspekar for Anny mathesone Requerit the
aldirman and balyeis to gif hir ane lauchefule Inquest Anent the lande
that was vmquhile Dauid mathesonis hir fadiris and producit ane chartir of
the saide Dauidis Sesin of the saide lande Ande the aldirman and balyeis
assignit this day xv dais the secunde day of September' next to cum
to the said' Agnes to minister Justice Anent hir' Inquest

The saide day the court wardit schewe for lawe and It was gevin for dome
that Johne of Kennertj hede previt Sufficientlie that Canny Cullane
was aving to him tua barrellis of Salmonde for Johne balcrome
yongar the quhilkis the balyes chargit hir' to pay within terme of lawe

The saide day Alexander menyeis aldirman Johne leslie of Warderis Robert blinsele Dauy
menyeis Johne Cullane Alexander Rede Alexander chamer gilbert menyeis James Colisone
thomas leslie Johne of mar' Johne Colisone and Jhone of Retre was chosin
procuratouris and commissaris for the Consale and communite of the said' burghe' with pouer
to substitut' vndir thame to Comper befor the arbitouris chosin betuix the
tone and sere Androw fraser of Stanewode et cetera the xxij day of this Instant
monetht of August et cetera with continuacioune of dais to follow and defende Anent
the debatis of the landis of the tullauche' et cetera Ande ordanit ane commission'
to be gevin thame vndir thar' commone sele tharupon'
